subcategory.name: Breadcrumbs
subcategory.description: Breadcrumb examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS breadcrumb components to display a trail of links for easy backtracing in your application. These components are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.

snippet.name: react
snippet.preview:
1. Home
  2. Projects
  3. Project Nero
snippet.code:
import { HomeIcon } from '@heroicons/react/20/solid' const pages = [ { name: 'Projects', href: '#', current: false }, { name: 'Project Nero', href: '#', current: true }, ] export default function Example() { return (
  1. Home
    2. {pages.map((page) => (
  2. {page.name}
    3. ))}
) }
